document_data.name: Infinity
document_data.mainbody: '''Infinity''' was a [[half-elf|half-elven]] adventuring [[diviner]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|212|Infinity}}
document_data.Description: Infinity was a tall and athletically built half-elf male with long blond hair and pale skin.
document_data.Possessions: Infinity traveled with his trusty [[quarterstaff]], a ''[[cloak of elvenkind]]'', and a ''[[ring of protection]]'' +1.
document_data.History: Infinity learned the art from his father, a retired adventurer due to a blinding curse that ended his career early. Thanks to spending his youth caring for his father, Infinity became proficient in crafting ''[[Healing potion|healing potions]]''. In his adult life, Infinity was an adventurer himself, traveling with a group of warriors as their friend and healer.
